member.name: M:CeGui.WidgetSets.Taharez.TLMiniHorizontalScrollbar.GetAdjustDirectionFromPoint(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Given window location , return a value indicating what change should be made to the scroll position.
member.param: Point describing a pixel position in window space.
member.returns: - -1 to indicate scroll position should be moved to a lower setting. - 0 to indicate scroll position should not be moved. - +1 to indicate scroll position should be moved to a higher setting.

member.summary: Image to use when rendering the button right section (pushed state).

member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: M:CeGui.WidgetSets.Taharez.TLButton.SetNormalImage(CeGui.RenderableImage)
member.summary: Set the details of the image to render for the button in the normal state.
member.param: RenderableImage object with all the details for the image. Note that an internal copy of the Renderable image is made and ownership of remains with client code. If this parameter is NULL, rendering of an image for this button state is disabled.

member.name: M:CeGui.WidgetSets.Taharez.TLButton.SetHoverImage(CeGui.RenderableImage)
member.summary: Set the details of the image to render for the button in the hover state.
member.param: RenderableImage object with all the details for the image. Note that an internal copy of the Renderable image is made and ownership of remains with client code. If this parameter is NULL, rendering of an image for this button state is disabled.

member.name: M:CeGui.WidgetSets.Taharez.TLButton.SetPushedImage(CeGui.RenderableImage)
member.summary: Set the details of the image to render for the button in the pushed state.
member.param: RenderableImage object with all the details for the image. Note that an internal copy of the Renderable image is made and ownership of remains with client code. If this parameter is NULL, rendering of an image for this button state is disabled.

member.name: M:CeGui.WidgetSets.Taharez.TLButton.SetDisabledImage(CeGui.RenderableImage)
member.summary: Set the details of the image to render for the button in the disabled state.
member.param: RenderableImage object with all the details for the image. Note that an internal copy of the Renderable image is made and ownership of remains with client code. If this parameter is NULL, rendering of an image for this button state is disabled.

member.name: P:CeGui.WidgetSets.Taharez.TLButton.CustomImageryAutoSized
member.summary: Get/Set whether of not custom button image areas are auto-scaled to the size of the button.
member.value: true if client specified custom image areas are re-sized when the button size changes. false if image areas will remain unchanged when the button is sized.

member.name: P:CeGui.WidgetSets.Taharez.TLButton.StandardImageryEnabled
member.summary: Get/Set whether or not rendering of the standard imagery is enabled.
member.value: true if the standard button imagery will be rendered, false if no standard rendering will be performed.
